page.title: 06Arable Farms Around Epworth.
page.content: Most land under cultivation in our area is given over to{wheat}and {barley.}Recently{Oil Seed Rape}has emerged as a popular crop and its bright yellow flower has made a tremendous impact on the local landscape in Spring. Although{Rape}and{Cereals}are the commonest crops, a wide variety of others are grown.{Potatoes}are the most common vegetable and fields of { {beetroot, peas, carrots}and {swedes} can also be seen. Another favourite with the farmer is {sugarbeet.}This crop is sent to { {Brigg,}twenty miles away,for processing at a large factory owned by British Sugar Corporation.
